0.1.name: wordpress/wp-post-formats
0.1.description:
WP Post Formats creates a visual interface for modifying and editing how your post formats are formatted.

There Are A Number Of Tags Available To Use In Your Loops And You Can Add More Via A Hook.

Tags:

{permalink} {content, more_link_text, stripteaser} {excerpt} {title, before, after} {tags, before, sep, after} {author} {category, seperator, parents} {time} {post-thumbnail, size} {term-list, taxonomy, before, sep, after} {post-class}

Hooks:

do_action( 'wppf_tags' );
  • Runs Right After The Tags Are Handled, Allowing You To Add More As You Please ( Let Me Know Ill Put Them In The Next Release)
apply_filters( 'wppf_before_tag' , '{_' );
  • Allows you to filter the Start Tag used
apply_fi
